entry.title: Friday night: Mainly cloudy. Temperature rising to minus 16 this evening then falling.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 late this evening. Temperature rising to minus 16 this evening then falling. Wind chill minus 25 this evening and minus 38 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 8:17 PM MST Friday 24 February 2023
